entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
